Source.Name: zenergy
Source.Summary: AMD Zen energy driver for the linux-lts kernel
Source.Description: Based on AMD_ENERGY driver, modified so non-root users can read it safely. Exposes the energy counters that are reported via the Running Average Power Limit (RAPL) Model-specific Registers (MSRs) through the hardware monitor (HWMON) sysfs interface.
